means: <口>（指书等）爱不忍释的，不忍释手的

sentence.Network_en: That story is as unputdownable to a taxi driver as to a university professor.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个故事叫出租车司机和大学教授都爱不释手,津津乐读.

sentence.Network_en: That story is as unputdownable to taxi driver as to a university professor.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个故事“叫”“出租车”司机和大学教授都爱不释手,津津乐读.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《创艺漫游》04期视觉杂志 - ... ... ADIDAS{ 超级变身} Unputdownable{ 爱不释手} Matchbox{ 年轻的战士}.
...，只有《间谍》乐于刊登。正是这类对国家、大企业、大明星、大作家……作不留余地的揭露，才使《间谍》趣味盎然，令人手不释 …
以至于到第三册有欲罢不能(unputdownable)之感。这三本书除了越来越好看以外，也越来越厚。

means.word_mean: 1. (of a book etc) so well written and entertaining as to be difficult to put down;

sentences.sentence: "Unless the story is at once as unputdownable to a taxi driver as to a university professor it is not good enough"- Brian Burland
